threat_severity.level_description: Severity MEDIUM because it was considered trojan.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Schedule Task Creation From Env Variable Or Potentially Suspicious Path Via Schtasks.EXE
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects Schtask creations that point to a suspicious folder or an environment variable often used by malware

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=schtasks.exe; Hashes=MD5=796B784E98008854C27F4B18D287BA30,SHA256=356280CCA63CA5E887FDBE5CB4105A53341FBAC9219EFC51621DF9BA8EE9838B,IMPHASH=ECCE05491F2E8F279F4790BCB1318C05; Description=Task Scheduler Configuration Tool; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe /c schtasks /Create /TN "PeerCreator" /TR "C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\WSystemPeers\WPeerC.exe" /SC ONLOGON /RL HIGHEST /F >nul 2>nul; CommandLine=schtasks  /Create /TN "PeerCreator" /TR "C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\WSystemPeers\WPeerC.exe" /SC ONLOGON /RL HIGHEST /F ; FileVersion=10.0.19041.906 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\schtasks.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Read Contents From Stdin Via Cmd.EXE
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detect the use of "<" to read and potentially execute a file via cmd.exe

match_context.values: @{CommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe /c schtasks /Create /TN PeerCreator /TR C:\Users\<USER>\AppData\Roaming\WSystemPeers\WPeerC.exe /SC ONLOGON /RL HIGHEST /F >nul 2>nul; Image=C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe; EventID=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious DNS Query for IP Lookup Service APIs
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects DNS queries for IP lookup services such as "api.ipify.org" originating from a non browser process.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Network Connection to IP Lookup Service APIs
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects external IP address lookups by non-browser processes via services such as "api.ipify.org". This could be indicative of potential post compromise internet test activity.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Schtasks Schedule Type With High Privileges
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects scheduled task creations or modification to be run with high privileges on a suspicious schedule type

match_context.values: @{Hashes=MD5=796B784E98008854C27F4B18D287BA30,SHA256=356280CCA63CA5E887FDBE5CB4105A53341FBAC9219EFC51621DF9BA8EE9838B,IMPHASH=ECCE05491F2E8F279F4790BCB1318C05; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=schtasks.exe; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Task Scheduler Configuration Tool; FileVersion=10.0.19041.906 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe /c schtasks /Create /TN "PeerCreator" /TR "C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\WSystemPeers\WPeerC.exe" /SC ONLOGON /RL HIGHEST /F >nul 2>nul; CommandLine=schtasks  /Create /TN "PeerCreator" /TR "C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\WSystemPeers\WPeerC.exe" /SC ONLOGON /RL HIGHEST /F ; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\schtasks.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the creation of scheduled tasks by user accounts via the "schtasks" utility.

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=schtasks.exe; Hashes=MD5=796B784E98008854C27F4B18D287BA30,SHA256=356280CCA63CA5E887FDBE5CB4105A53341FBAC9219EFC51621DF9BA8EE9838B,IMPHASH=ECCE05491F2E8F279F4790BCB1318C05; Description=Task Scheduler Configuration Tool; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe /c schtasks /Create /TN "PeerCreator" /TR "C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\WSystemPeers\WPeerC.exe" /SC ONLOGON /RL HIGHEST /F >nul 2>nul; CommandLine=schtasks  /Create /TN "PeerCreator" /TR "C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\WSystemPeers\WPeerC.exe" /SC ONLOGON /RL HIGHEST /F ; FileVersion=10.0.19041.906 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\schtasks.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

exiftool.FileDescription: Create and manage peers, extern WINAPI, using for checking system updates, read and write data to all Win-Sockets.

signature_info.description: Create and manage peers, extern WINAPI, using for checking system updates, read and write data to all Win-Sockets.

attributes.magic: PE32+ executable (console) x86-64, for MS Windows

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_category: Device Retrieving External IP Address Detected
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET POLICY External IP Lookup api.ipify.org
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET POLICY External IP Lookup api.ipify.org"; flow:established,to_server; urilen:1; http.method; content:"GET"; http.host; content:"api.ipify.org"; fast_pattern; reference:md5,79809fd3e05a852581b897cc4b06aa32; classtype:external-ip-check; sid:2021997; rev:6; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2015_10_23, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2024_11_26, mitre_tactic_id TA0043, mitre_tactic_name Reconnaissance, mitre_technique_id T1590, mitre_technique_name Gather_Victim_Network_Information;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO External IP Lookup Domain (ipify .org) in DNS Lookup
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO External IP Lookup Domain (ipify .org) in DNS Lookup"; dns.query; dotprefix; content:".ipify.org"; nocase; endswith; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2047702; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Any, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2023_08_22, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, tag External_IP_Lookup, updated_at 2023_08_22, reviewed_at 2023_10_06, mitre_tactic_id TA0043, mitre_tactic_name Reconnaissance, mitre_technique_id T1590, mitre_technique_name Gather_Victim_Network_Information;)
